public static interface

CacheDataSource.EventListener

com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache.CacheDataSource.EventListener

Class Overview

Interface definition for a callback to be notified of CacheDataSource events.

Summary

Public Methods
abstract void onCachedBytesRead(long cacheSizeBytes, long cachedBytesRead)
Invoked when bytes have been read from the cache.

Public Methods

public abstract void onCachedBytesRead (long cacheSizeBytes, long cachedBytesRead)

Invoked when bytes have been read from the cache.

Parameters
cacheSizeBytes Current cache size in bytes.
cachedBytesRead Total bytes read from the cache since this method was last invoked.
